thread.title: 10 things Latinas 'kick ass' at, as told by Eva Longoria
thread.title_full: 10 things Latinas 'kick ass' at, as told by Eva Longoria - San Antonio Express-News

author: Madalyn Mendoza
title: 10 things Latinas 'kick ass' at, as told by Eva Longoria
text:
Photo: Joe Raedle, Getty Images Image 1 of / 11 11 1. Being passionate
"We're definitely passionate, probably the most passionate women on this Earth." 1. Being passionate
"We're definitely passionate, probably the most passionate women on this Earth." Photo: Joe Raedle, Getty Images Image 2 of 11 2. Cooking
"A lot of us know how to cook." 2. Cooking
"A lot of us know how to cook." Photo: BAHRAM MARK SOBHANI, SAN ANTONIO EXPRESS-NEWS Image 3 of 11 3. Being strong and independent women
3. Being strong and independent women Photo: Courtesy Photo Image 4 of 11 4. Being bilingual
"Most Latinas are..."
4. Being bilingual
"Most Latinas are..." Photo: Edward A. Ornelas, San Antonio Express-News Image 5 of 11 5. Being a family member
"Latinas usually kick a** at being a family member," Longoria said. "Whether you're a mom, a daughter, an aunt, a madrina or a comadre." 5. Being a family member
"Latinas usually kick a** at being a family member," Longoria said. "Whether you're a mom, a daughter, an aunt, a madrina or a comadre." Photo: Joe Raedle, Getty Images Image 6 of 11 6. Having a strong work ethic
"You find a Latina in a workplace, pretty sure she's kicking a**." 6. Having a strong work ethic
"You find a Latina in a workplace, pretty sure she's kicking a**." Photo: Digital Light Source, Getty Images Image 7 of 11 7. Celebrating our differences
"We celebrate every size and color that we are."
7. Celebrating our differences
"We celebrate every size and color that we are." Photo: Max Nombrano/Express-News Image 8 of 11 8. Being bicultural
"Most Latinas have the gift of being bicultural, that's a really hard thing to navigate, I think Latinas do it amazing." 8. Being bicultural
"Most Latinas have the gift of being bicultural, that's a really hard thing to navigate, I think Latinas do it amazing." Photo: David McNew, Getty Images Image 9 of 11 9. Leading the pack
"Latinas are leaders, fearless leaders." 9. Leading the pack
"Latinas are leaders, fearless leaders." Photo: David McNew, Getty Images Image 10 of 11 10. Being the life of the party
"Latinas are a pretty fun group to be around." 10. Being the life of the party
"Latinas are a pretty fun group to be around." Photo: Manny Hernandez, Getty Images Image 11 of 11 10 things Latinas 'kick ass' at, as told by Eva Longoria 1 / 11 Back to Gallery Eva Longoria knows a thing or two about what it takes to be a Latina, so she dished on the things they “kick ass” at getting done.
In a Marie Claire video, the Corpus Christi native talked about a list of things Latinas do exceptionally well.
Cooking, being a madrina and working all while leading the pack can be tiresome but Longoria said Latinas were made for the job.
RELATED: Eva Longoria traveled to D.C. to meet Pope Francis with her 'hero' sister
The actress has experienced the struggle of balancing family time with work time in recent years as her career has become more multi-faceted. She recently was able to take her elder sister to the White House to see the Pope and frequently returns to San Antonio to relax with her family.
“You find a Latina in a work place, pretty sure she’s kicking ass,” the leading Latina said in the video.
Click through the gallery above for her full list.
